entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
